caption.p: Boxplot of enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) values (S/N) for sera and individual milk immediately after persistently infected (PI) cattle removal (Test 1), and the ELISA values (S/N) for individual milk 2 months after Test 1 (Test 2) on the farms with detected PI cattle (Panel “A” is Farm No. 1 and panel “B” is Farm No. 5). S/N=the optical density of the sample / the optical density of the negative control.
